body_html: On 2), is there a case where we couldn't do the function checks using the method tests? (My issue is really the need to specify the same "tests" twice, in two different ways). What I mean is, the methods (at least the ones I've looked at), end up calling a function at the end anyway, and we can get at the resulting output/grad the same way, right?
